=== Xubuntu 6.06.1 LTS Launches ===

Today sees the release of Xubuntu 6.06.1 LTS (Long Term Support). This version of Xubuntu will be supported for 3 years on the desktop and brings you all of the latest Xfce goodness.

For further information and on download locations, see: XubuntuReleases

Release notes can be found at: XubuntuDapperReleaseNotes
